text: just had some breaking news and that is
that the Icelandic Prime Minister Mr
goon Larson has now stood down he had
asked for Parliament to be dissolved a
little earlier in the day following
demonstrations that outside the
parliament building but the president
had refused for the dissolution of
Parliament to all to do with shares or a
company in his wife's name in the
british virgin islands with links to
Icelandic banks and basically if the
Icelandic banks having been restructured
floated were to improve he or his wife
had a personal interest in the success
of those banks this hadn't been declared
this has come out in the Panama papers
he gave an interview in the last 24
hours saying there was nothing to hide
but he has now stood down that news that
just in from Reykjavik
